author: Moshkelgosha
title: Does Warren Buffet know what others do not???
excerpt: I remember when I read an article about Warren Buffet sitting on 128 billion dollars cash at the end of 2019, I asked myself: What is about to happen? The pandemic-related crash happened in the following 2 months! Now, he is sitting on a bigger amount of cash. According to Bloomberg, he is sitting on 149.2 Billion Dollars in the era of the highest inflation rate...
